nodes.text: Hot chocolate was a beverage. Zare Leonis enjoyed this beverage with tang bark. Once, when Leonis wanted something hot to drink and asked for caf, the nanny droid Auntie Nags served him this instead, as it would not keep him awake. Another time, when Leonis was on a break from training at the Academy for Young Imperials, Auntie Nags again served him hot chocolate.
A specialty hot chocolate was served at two locations within Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu: Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo and Ronto Roasters.
